message: Failed at least one business validation rules

errors.description: [IRASC5-035]-An Invoice MUST have an Invoice total GST amount (IBT-110).
[IRASC5-048]-All distinct values of the Invoiced item GST category codes (IBT-151) MUST tally with the values of the GST category codes (IBT-118).
[IRASC5-075]-All currencyID attributes must have the same value as the Invoice currency code (IBT-005), except for amounts expected to be in accounting currency (IBT-006).
